name: Music Quiz: Angels and Airwaves: 10 Questions |   Music

questions.text: Complete the title of Angels and Airwaves' debut album: "We Don't Need To __________".
questions.explanation:
whisper.

	"We Don't Need To Whisper" was released on May 23, 2006. Their single "The Adventure" was released on May 18 of that year, five days before the release of the album.

questions.text: According to "Valkyrie Missile", where should one leave their pain?
questions.explanation:
bedroom floor.

	"Everyone, everyone will listenEven if it hurts sometimesIf you will, come and hear the messageEveryone wants to learn to love againOpen up and come alive if you willCan you hear my message?Leave your pain on the bedroom floor againBring a smile to surviveAnd do you think that you have that in youIf you're here and you're all alone tonightThen I'll give you a free rideTake a chance 'cause I know you want to."

questions.text: In "Distraction", what part of the boys' bodies were in the sand?
questions.explanation:
knees.

	"We cared too lateWe just followed alongAnd the boys went downWith a gun in their handTheir weapon of choice,Their knees in the sandIf that field nearbyWas still there to be usedWould you ever have known?Those words were for you."

questions.text: What is the shortened name for the band?
questions.explanation:
AVA.

	Ava is also the name of Tom DeLonge's daughter. An inverted V features prominently on the band's logo.

questions.text: Is this the correct lyric from "Do It For Me Now"?: "When the guy grabs the girl and gives her his hand/Says take me away from this horrible land"
questions.explanation:
No.

	"When the guy grabs the girl and gives her his hand/Says take me away from this torturous land" is the correct lyric. "Do It For Me Now" is my favorite song on the album.

questions.text: In "The Adventure", what can't the singer do on his own?
questions.explanation:
Live and breathe.

	"I cannot live, I can't breatheunless you do this with me.I cannot live, I can't breatheunless you do this with me."

questions.text: The band's original drummer, Atom Willard, was a member of this band.
questions.explanation:
The Offspring.

	The Offspring's hit singles include "The Kids Aren't All Right" and "Pretty Fly (For a White Guy)" as well as "Gonna Get Away". Willard began drumming for the band in 2003.

questions.text: Ryan Sinn once played for the Whine.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Sinn was the bassist for the Distillers, not the Whine. (I made that band name up.) Sinn was born in 1979 in Fremont, California. The Distillers formed in 1998.

questions.text: What band has David Kennedy NOT played with?
questions.explanation:
Green Day.

	David Kennedy plays guitar for Angels and Airwaves and is a childhood friend of frontman Tom DeLonge. They both grew up in Poway, California.

questions.text: What was the first single released by the band?
questions.explanation:
The Adventure.

	"The Adventure" is one of the album's better-known songs. It was released several days before the album, and an earlier version of the album was leaked on April 11, 2006.
